title: ToolTask that fail ValidateParameters fail "silently"
body:
If you have a ToolTask with ValidateParameters that returns false (and does not log) then you get an output like this:

```
Using "FooTask" task from assembly "Foo.dll".
Task "FooTask" (TaskId:14)
  Task Parameter:OutputDirectory=obj/Debug/foo (TaskId:14)
Done executing task "FooTask" -- FAILED. (TaskId:14)
Done building target "Foo" in project "sample-xm.csproj" -- FAILED.: (TargetId:33)
```

It would be nice if it printed "Task X failed parameter validation" or something.
